name.ja: <ruby>罪<rt>ざい</rt></ruby><ruby>宝<rt>ほう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>咎<rt>とが</rt></ruby><ruby>人<rt>びと</rt></ruby>

text.en: If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) from the Deck and/or Extra Deck and you control a "Diabellstar" Monster Card: Target 1 monster they control; shuffle it into the Deck. During the Damage Step, if your "Diabellstar" monster battles an opponent's monster: You can banish this card from your GY; that opponent's monster's ATK becomes halved until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Sinful Spoils Offenders" once per turn.
